name: contrd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))))
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))))
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), w1)
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), wi(wn(w1), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), wi(wn(w1), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wn(w1), wa(w2, wn(w2))), wi(wn(w1), w1))
-| wi(wa(w2, wn(w2)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
-| wi(wa(w2, wn(w2)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w2, wn(w2)), w1)
-| wi(w2, wi(wn(w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
-| wi(w2, wi(wn(w2), w1))

|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))

comment: A proof by contradiction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)
